    • 方法详细资料

      • getSuperstepNumber

        public int getSuperstepNumber()
        从接口复制的说明: IterationRuntimeContext
        Gets the number of the current superstep. Superstep numbers start at 1.
        指定者:
        getSuperstepNumber 在接口中 IterationRuntimeContext
        返回:
        The number of the current superstep.

      • addAccumulator

        public <V,A extends java.io.Serializable> void addAccumulator(java.lang.String name,
                                                              Accumulator<V,A> newAccumulator)
        从接口复制的说明: RuntimeContext
        Add this accumulator. Throws an exception if the accumulator already exists in the same Task. Note that the Accumulator name must have an unique name across the Flink job. Otherwise you will get an error when incompatible accumulators from different Tasks are combined at the JobManager upon job completion.
        指定者:
        addAccumulator 在接口中 RuntimeContext
        覆盖:
        addAccumulator 在类中 AbstractRuntimeUDFContext
